data.title: tasty treats
data.text: with the beautiful comfortable tables and couches, the place is nice and cozy for a delicious lunch or snacks. The  service is good and the people are very friendly. they have multiple choices for hot dogs and specialty sandwiches with very reasonable prices.

data.title: Family-style with lots of lush, delicious, inexpensive food.
data.text: Lynn's restaurant scene has really come alive,and CM Bistro is among the reasons. Family-owned, lush, delicious food at inexpensive prices.Take a side trip from Salem or Boston, you wont be disappointed!

data.title: Fast and comfy
data.text: this place is located near the court house in the city of lynn the food has been on pointe and fast . The ambiance incredible great place to have a quick chat and Go .

data.title: Perfect bright little healthy spot in downtown Lynn
data.text: Bright and cheery decor, simple counter setup with just a few tables and chairs,  an array of fresh squeezed vegetable and fruit juices. They don't add sugar unless you request it. They carry hearty sandwiches and gourmet hotdogs, soups and sweet crepes. Very friendly and super super clean! Free wifi cafe style. I had the beet carrot juice and a classic hotdog with all the fixings prepared for me. Perfect and only $5! Check this one out 😊
